title: Cant decrease gazebo main window height

content.raw:
Gazebo from ros-jade binary package on Linux Mint 17.2. When running, main window minimal height is equal to desktop size, and ignores bottom/top Menu panel, because of this, gazebo`s lower panel with time, and simulation pause goes behind Menu panel. I cant decrease height by window resizing. Decreasing  geometry.height in gui.ini had no effect too, only increasing.

Gazebo version 5.0.1, and i didn't find it in versions menu, sorry for that


![gazebo_height.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2681956249-gazebo_height.png)
